description: Adapts the response to use business-oriented language appropriate for professional contexts. This decorator generates content using formal business terminology, clear and concise phrasing, and industry-appropriate jargon when relevant.

parameters.name: industry
parameters.description: The specific industry context to adapt the language for

parameters.name: formality
parameters.description: The level of formality to maintain in the response

examples.usage:
+++Professional
Explain the benefits of implementing a CRM system.
examples.result: Delivers a clear, professional explanation of CRM benefits using business-appropriate language and structure

examples.usage:
+++Professional(industry=healthcare, formality=executive)
Summarize the impact of telehealth adoption on patient outcomes.
examples.result: Produces an executive-level analysis of telehealth impacts using healthcare industry terminology and highly formal business language
